snippet.title: Chants of Sennaar - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.focus-entmt.com/w/chantsofsennaar?utm_campaign=COS_Launch&utm_medium=description&utm_source=YouTube

Unveil mysteries behind the fragments of the past

Divided since the dawn of time, the Peoples of the Tower no longer speak to each other. But it is said that one day, a Traveler will find the wisdom to break down the walls and restore the Balance. Explore and discover a fascinating world where men have forgotten their past; a colorful and poetic setting inspired by the myth of Babel and visually drawing from European comic artists and a miscellany of architectural styles. Travel the endless steps of a prodigious labyrinth, uncover an ominous truth and unveil the mysteries of this captivating universe where ancient languages are both the lock and the key.

A special vinyl for an enchanting music

We wanted players to be able to enjoy the tremendous OST of the game with a special vinyl for Chants of Sennaar, coming with an additional numbered lithography. Enjoy the instrumental music composed by Thomas Brunet! This exclusivity is available to pre-order now, only on the Focus Entertainment Store. The vinyl will be available in the coming weeks, so stay tuned!

Chants of Sennaar is out now on PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One, with a free demo everywhere and a 10% launch discount on Steam. A special bundle including the game and its enchanting OST is available on Steam and on the Focus Store.  Sign up as a Focus member for more information as well as upcoming news and offers for Chants of Sennaar and the whole Focus catalog.
